title: Their Eyes Were Watching God - parable of creation

content.prompt: The parable of creation (paragraph 3) serves primarily to

choices.label: provide a contrast to the funeral described earlier
illustrate Janie's self-perception and philosophy of life
summarize the early influences on Janie's behavior
demonstrate differences between Janie's ideas and the author's

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
